com.cognex.dataman.sdk

Interface Logger


  • public interface Logger
    Interface definition for a logger object to be used for logging important events and/or traffic between the remote system and the SDK.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getNextUniqueSessionId()
      Returns a unique id that can be used to track logs and traffic data of one session.
      boolean isEnabled()
      Indicates whether logging is enabled or not.
      void log(String function, String message)
      Writes a log entry.
      void log(String function, String message, Exception exception)
      Writes a log entry with exception trace.
      void logTraffic(int sessionId, boolean isRead, byte[] buffer, int offset, int count)
      Logs a read or write operation.
      void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Enables or disables logging.

    • Method Detail

      • isEnabled

        boolean isEnabled()
        Indicates whether logging is enabled or not.
        Returns:
        true if logging is enabled, otherwise false.

      • setEnabled

        void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enables or disables logging.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true to enable logging, false otherwise.

      • getNextUniqueSessionId

        int getNextUniqueSessionId()
        Returns a unique id that can be used to track logs and traffic data of one session. This method is called by the DataManSystem object when a connection is being established.
        Returns:
        A new unique id that can be used to distinguish logs and traffic data of different communication sessions.

      • log

        void log(String function,
         String message)
        Writes a log entry.
        Parameters:
        function - Name of the function for which the log entry is created.
        message - The log message.

      • log

        void log(String function,
         String message,
         Exception exception)
        Writes a log entry with exception trace.
        Parameters:
        function - Name of the function for which the log entry is created.
        message - The log message.
        exception - The exception object to trace

      • logTraffic

        void logTraffic(int sessionId,
                boolean isRead,
                byte[] buffer,
                int offset,
                int count)
        Logs a read or write operation.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - The unique id of the session to which this log belong.
        isRead - true in case of a read operation, false in case of a write operation.
        buffer - Buffer that contains the bytes that were read/written.
        offset - Offset in the buffer to log from.
        count - Number of bytes to write to the log from the buffer.
